= Introduction =

BDD: Metadata DSL parser

== Interface ==
IConfig

== Given ==
A clean machine

=== When ===
Horn stores the configuration for each component in a DSL like syntax

=== Then ===
Horn can parse out the relevant configuration of the component to perform a build

=== When ===
The DSL is badly formed

=== Then ===
A custom exception will point to DSL text line error

=== When ===
The user supplies an unknow component

=== Then ===
The system will display an error message stating the component is unknown
